title: [wiki翻译]石头(Stone)
author: Wind2010
txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: green丶bastard
replies.txt_content: indev和infedev都是mc老版本。。那个版本石头只能建造

replies.author: a368389669
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 a368389669 于 2011-8-2 17:01 编辑 

The Stone layer of a Creative map contains Caverns, Ore and underground pools of Water and Lava.
可翻译成 在地图包括洞穴，矿石和地下水池的水和熔岩创造石层。（大概吧）

replies.author: green丶bastard
replies.txt_content:
The Stone layer of a Creative map contains Caverns, Ore and underground pools of Water and Lava.
地图的石头层包括了洞窟，矿和地下的水和岩浆


。。。

replies.author: Craft_Lawrence
replies.txt_content:
我说这个条目已经有官方中文翻译了吧- -
只要在wiki里输Stone/ch就能找到了= =
